data.label: Ren'Py
data.description: Ren'Py 是一种视觉小说引擎，被来自世界各地数以千计的创作者们使用，可帮助您使用文字、图像和声音在计算机和移动设备上运行交互式故事。

data.label: Ren'Py
data.description: Ren'Py is a visual novel engine used by thousands of creators around the world, helping you run interactive stories on computers and mobile devices using text, images, and sound.
